title: Best Draft Spots + Double Flex Advice, Fresh Money - Fantasy Football Podcast for 7/23
description:
On today’s fantasy football podcast, the best draft spots for 2022, flex strategy, and lots more! Tee Higgins or Keenan Allen? Should you draft Leonard Fournette in the 2nd round? Andy, Mike, and Jason answer a handful of tough questions from listeners. Plus, the latest news, including Kyler Murray’s big contract extension! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for July 23rd, 2022.

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit and Draft Analyzer are available NOW
